mapper.select: SELECT name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT MIN(jr.id) AS min_id FROM job_recruit jr WHERE jr.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY GROUP BY jr.title, jr.company_id ) AS unique_jobs JOIN job_recruit_category jrc ON unique_jobs.min_id = jrc.job_recruit_id JOIN category c ON c.id = jrc.category_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5
